title: The NFL Appealed the Deshaun Watson Ruling. Now What?
description:
Sheil and Lindsay go through the Deshaun Watson ruling, the NFL’s appeal, and what all of it means heading into the 2022-23 season.

Hosts: Sheil Kapadia and Lindsay Jones
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal and Conor Nevins
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
